title: Corbyn-proof your investments with this portfolio
text:
Labour has officially backed proposals for a General Election before Christmas. For investors, this raises the spectre of a Labour government within weeks.

A Jeremy Corbyn administration would represent a huge shift from the status quo. Here, Telegraph Money looks at the likely impact of a Labour government on your portfolio and what you can buy to protect your money.

Stocks

One of the expected consequences of a Labour government is that the pound would fall as foreign investors removed their money from Britain. We experienced this after the Brexit vote in June 2016 and should expect a similar outcome this time.

Domestic companies, particularly smaller ones, are likely to be negatively affected,...
description: Labour has officially backed proposals for a General Election before Christmas.
